p: Aerial parts of the studied plants were used. Plantago major was collected in March 2018 in the valley of River Struma (: 41°56′46.24″ N 23°5′54.23″ E, 212 m a.s.l.), a voucher specimen (No. SOM 1390) has been deposited in the Herbarium of the Institute of Biodiversity and Ecosystem Research, Bulgarian Academy of Sciences (IBER-BAS). Sideritis scardica collected in June 2017, was cultivated in the Western Rhodope Mountain (41°57′36.34″ N 23°39′19.32″ E, 1202 m a.s.l.), a voucher specimen has been deposited in the Herbarium of the IBER-BAS, No. SOM 1391. Plant material was collected and identified by Assoc. Prof. Dr. Ina Aneva.
